code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:35 YO white male presents with 9 days history of moderate abdominal pain. patient also reports moderate nausea. he drinks 2 beers per night Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 64 in, Weight 144 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15, eyes = dilated pupil, Abdomen = non tender, non distended, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ondansetron - 8 mg 1-2 x day, and ordered Abdominal X-Ray.

content2.Unmatched: beers per night Denies ever using tobacco

td.content: s:patient presents with 4 months history of moderate nausea and moderate abdominal pain. pt is a 36 yo white male. he drinks 2 beers per night he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 63 in, Weight 141 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, eyes = dilated pupil, Abdomen = non tender, non distended, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:36 year old male presents with 3 months history of moderate nausea and moderate abdominal pain. drinks daily Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 65 in, Weight 147 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17, eyes = dilated pupil, Abdomen = non tender, non distended, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Nausea p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Nasogastric Tube - stomach.
